module.name: Asterisk API
module.changelog: *13.0.2.6* FREEPBX-20436 XSS vulnerability in manager module *13.0.2.5* Tweaking database output error handling *13.0.2.4* Add default parameter to the other add function as well *13.0.2.3* FREEPBX-9783 add default parameter to add function *13.0.2.2* Fix typo *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* Add Write Timeout, FREEPBX-6421 *13.0.1alpha1* Visual changes *12.0.2* Minor update for BMO and FreePBX 12. *2.11.0.2* #6088, don't allow duplicate FreePBX managers and rename *2.11.0.1* #6429 *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.2* #5565 properly generate manager_additional.conf with manager_conf class *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.3* #5097 *2.9.0.2* spelling, localizations *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions, set repository *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
